execution_plan.description: Join customers with customer_payment_methods to list each customer's first name, middle initial, last name, and their payment method codes.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customers.customer_first_name AS s1__customer_first_name, customers.customer_middle_initial AS s1__customer_middle_initial, customers.customer_last_name AS s1__customer_last_name, customer_payment_methods.payment_method_code AS s1__payment_method_code FROM customers JOIN customer_payment_methods ON customers.customer_id = customer_payment_methods.customer_id;
